'''Polo Baggins''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Polo was the second child, and only son, of [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto Baggins]] and [[Mimosa Bunce]]. In his turn, Polo also had a son and a daughter, [[Posco Baggins|Posco]] and [[Prisca Baggins|Prisca]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name ''Polo'' was meaningless in contemporary [[Hobbitish]] [[Westron]]. It represented an original name ''Pola''.<ref>{{App|Translation}}</ref>
